TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegexStringValidatorAttribute extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class RegexStringValidatorAttribute Inherits ConfigurationValidatorAttribute

summary.span: 以宣告方式指示 .NET Framework 在組態屬性上利用規則運算式執行字串驗證。

span.span: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform string validation on a configuration property using a regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用裝飾組態屬性，會指示要驗證屬性使用的.NET Framework和裝飾參數的值傳遞給它。You use the to decorate a configuration property, which will instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters. 您可以套用只有屬性類型的物件。You may apply objects to property types only. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在自訂屬性來裝飾物件使用物件。The following example shows how to decorate the properties of a custom object using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/CS/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/VB/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string regex) cil managed

param.name: regex
param.span: 用來驗證規則運算式的字串。

span.span: The string to use for regular expression validation.

summary.span: 初始化 物件的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `regex`參數包含字串必須符合規則運算式模式給裝飾的組態項目屬性之前。The `regex` parameter contains the regular expression pattern that a string must match before it can be assigned to the decorated configuration-element property. 屬性化的模型中所使用這個建構函式以確保指派給相關屬性的字串值包含允許的字元。You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the string value assigned to the related property contains only the allowed characters. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個 建構函式。The following example shows how to use the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/CS/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/VB/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Regex As String
public: property System::String ^ Regex { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來執行規則運算式驗證的字串。

span.span: Gets the string used to perform regular-expression validation.

value.span: 包含規則運算式的字串，此規則運算式是用來篩選指派給裝飾的組態項目屬性的字串。

span.span: The string containing the regular expression used to filter the string assigned to the decorated configuration-element property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來執行字串驗證藉由呼叫其方法。You use the property to perform string validation by calling its method. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
